text: Sad Satan is a 2015 horror video game that was allegedly made by someone nicknamed "ZK" on the dark web. In the game, the player walks through dimly lit hallways in a first-person view while getting periodically interrupted by images that flash on the screen. Also, various audio samples can be heard in the game. There are no goals or win conditions. ==References== Category:2015 video games Category:Horror video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Windows-only games Category:Windows games Category:Urban legends Category:Obscenity controversies in video games Category:Internet mysteries Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: Sad Satan
